item.title: Installing CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3 and TortoiseSVN 1.6.3 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article I install CollabNet Subversion Server 1.6.3, with TortoiseSVN 1.6.3, on Windows Server 2003 R2, Enterprise Edition, Service Pack 2.

item.title: Upgrading Subversion 1.5.x to 1.6.0 on Windows Vista - checklist
item.description: Subversion 1.6.0 released a short time ago, and all the Windows binaries are ready to go. Here's a checklist (which should be applicable for future use) on Subversion, Apache, and TortoiseSVN upgrading.

item.title: Subversion 1.5.3 and TortoiseSVN 1.5.4 released
item.description: The newest versions of Subversion and TortoiseSVN were released just last week.

item.title: Subversion and TortoiseSVN: Moving a repository
item.description: How to rename an existing Subversion repository.

item.title: Installing Subversion binaries for Apache 2.2.x
item.description: In this article we'll be covering the installation of Subversion to work with Apache 2.2.x.

item.title: Installing TortoiseSVN to Windows Vista
item.description: In this article I'll be installing TortoiseSVN 1.4.8 to a Windows machine, running Vista Ultimate. [slnet0514:ed428114-f660-445d-a5ae-5ef4756fd2b3]

item.title: Upgrading Subversion and TortoiseSVN on Windows (1.4.0 to 1.4.2)
item.description: In this article, we'll be upgrading our Subversion installation from 1.4.0 to 1.4.2.
